title: 21 - Special Sex at Dawn Episode (B): Response to Criticism
description:
In this special episode, Chris and Ivan Tucakov discuss some of the downsides of writing a popular book: aggressive interviewers, personal questions, and responding to critical reviews.



This is a public episode. If youâ€™d like to discuss this with other subscribers or get access to bonus episodes, visit chrisryan.substack.com/subscribe
